mapper.insert: insert into category(type, name, sort, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{type}, #{name},#{sort}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select * from category
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and type = #{type}
order by create_time desc
